title: S7 striped font
content:
Is this a font? Anyone know? :) Looks like something out of an old letraset-catalogue!  
Thanks.

[http://img138.imageshack.us/img138/1743/picture20ia9.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20130830192654/http:/img138.imageshack.us/img138/1743/picture20ia9.png "http://img138.imageshack.us/img138/1743/picture20ia9.png")
author: cuidado

comments.content:
Hello Petter,

have a look at [Stripes Letraset](http://web.archive.org/web/20130830192654/http:/bowfinprintworks.com/LinedFontGuide05.html). I think that’s the one. Not ‘S7’ but rather ‘87’.  
F

Thats it, thanks.

Anyone know if this is or has been made available in a digital format, or just reproduced after the samples?
